definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Is 27:10 abode of shepherd, or flocks, poet. habitation;—abs. Is 27:10 +; cstr. [[נְוֵה]] Ex 15:13 +; [[נְוַת]] Job 8:6 (as if fr. [[נׇוׇה]]; or rd. [[נְוֵה]] ?); sf. [[נׇֽוְְ]] Job 5:24, [[נׇוֵ֫הוּ]] 2Sa 15:25 +, [[נְוֵהֶם]] Je 49:20, Ez Eze 34:14 (cf. Sta:§ 351 c.), [[נְוֵהֶן]] Je 23:3 (so Baer Ginsb; [[נְוֵיהֶן]] van d. H., pl. acc. to Kö:ii, 1, p. 77);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: adode, of sheep 2Sa 7:8 (‖[[מֵאַחַר הַצּאׁן]]) = 1Ch 17:1; Is 65:10 (‖[[רָבַץ]]); of people under fig. of sheep Je 23:3, Je 49:20 = Je 50:45, Je 50:19 Ez Eze 34:14, Eze 34:14 (‖[[רָבַץ]], [[מִרְעֶה]]); of camels Ez Eze 25:5 (‖[[מִרְבַּץ חאׁן]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = meadow, in fig. of Ephr. planted ([[שָׁתוּל]]) as tree Ho 9:13.

habitation, usu. of country, or of domains in the country (chiefly poet.), Job 5:3, Job 8:6 ([[נְוַת חִדְקְֶָ]], v. supr.), Pr 21:20; ‖[[אׂהֶל]] Job 5:24, Job 18:15; ‖[[בַּיִת]] Pr 3:33; ‖[[רֵבֶץ]] Pr 24:15; of ´[[י]] in Canaan 2Sa 15:25; of Can. as place of ´[[י]]'s sanctuary, [[קָדְשְֶָׁ]] ´[[נ]] Ex 15:13; fig. of ´[[י]] himself, [[חֶדֶק]] ´[[נ]] Je 50:7; habit. of nation Je 10:25, Je 25:30, Is 32:18 ([[שָׁלוֹם]] ´[[נ]]), Ps 79:7; = city Is 27:10, esp. Jerus. Is 33:20 ([[שַׁאֲנׇן]] ´[[נ]], ‖[[אׂהֶל]]); [[אֵיתָן]] ´[[נ]] Je 49:19 (fig. of Edom) = Je 50:44 (of Bab.); of land of Isr., [[חֶדֶק]] ´[[נ]] Je 31:23 (‖[[הַר הַקּׂדֶשׁ]]). Twice of habitation of jackals Is 34:13, Is 35:7 (both ‖[[חָחִיר]]).
